User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user in the Hajaty platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user entity.

avatarUrl.description: URL of the user's avatar image.

totalSpent.description: Total amount of money spent by the user.

rank.description: User's rank in the system (e.g., مستكشف نجمي, قائد صاروخي, سيد المجرة, سيد كوني).

apiKey.description: User's unique API key for integrations.

referralCode.description: Unique referral code for the user.

referrerId.description: Reference to the User who referred this user.

createdAt.description: Date and time the user was created.

lastRewardClaimedAt.description: Date and time the daily reward was last claimed.

affiliateEarnings.description: Total earnings from the affiliate program.

affiliateLevel.description: User's marketing level in the affiliate system (e.g., برونزي, فضي, ذهبي, ماسي).

Service.title: Service
Service.description: Represents a service offered on the platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the service entity.

platform.description: Platform the service is offered on (e.g., Facebook, Instagram).

category.description: Category of the service (e.g., SMM, Advertising).

price.description: Price of the service per 1000 units.

refill.description: Indicates if the service supports refills in case of drops.

dripFeed.description: Indicates if drip-feed is available for this service.

avgTime.description: Average completion time for an order.

guarantee.description: Indicates if there is a guarantee for the service.

startTime.description: Estimated start time for the service delivery.

dropRate.description: Estimated drop rate for the service (e.g., '1-5%').

Order.title: Order
Order.description: Represents a user's order for a service.

id.description: Unique identifier for the order entity.

serviceName.description: Denormalized name of the service for display purposes.

link.description: The target link for the service (e.g., profile URL, post URL).

charge.description: The total amount charged for the order.

orderDate.description: Date and time the order was placed.

id.description: Unique identifier for the campaign entity.

platform.description: Platform the campaign is running on.

targetAudience.description: A description of the target audience for the campaign.

startDate.description: Date and time the campaign started.

endDate.description: Date and time the campaign ended.

durationDays.description: Duration of the campaign in days.

spend.description: Amount of the budget already spent.

impressions.description: Total number of times the ad was shown.

clicks.description: Total number of clicks on the ad.

results.description: Number of results achieved, based on the campaign goal.

id.description: Unique identifier for the deposit entity.

paymentMethod.description: Payment method used for the deposit.

details.description: Payment-specific details (e.g., phone number, transaction ID).

depositDate.description: Date and time the deposit was made.

Withdrawal.title: Withdrawal
Withdrawal.description: Represents a user's request to withdraw affiliate earnings.

id.description: Unique identifier for the withdrawal entity.

details.description: Withdrawal method specific details (e.g., phone number, Binance ID).

requestDate.description: Date and time the withdrawal was requested.

AffiliateTransaction.title: AffiliateTransaction
AffiliateTransaction.description: Represents a transaction for affiliate commission.

id.description: Unique identifier for the affiliate transaction entity.

userId.description: Reference to User who earned the commission. (Relationship: User 1:N AffiliateTransaction)

referralId.description: Reference to User who made the purchase that generated the commission. (Relationship: User 1:N AffiliateTransaction)

orderId.description: The order that generated this commission.

transactionDate.description: Date and time of the transaction.

level.description: The referral level this commission was generated from.

id.description: Unique identifier for the blog post entity.

publishDate.description: Date and time the blog post was published.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ticket entity.

userId.description: Reference to User who created the ticket. (Relationship: User 1:N Ticket)

createdDate.description: Date and time the ticket was created.

messages.description: A list of all messages in the ticket thread.

SystemLog.title: SystemLog
SystemLog.description: Represents a log entry for a significant system event.

event.description: A short, machine-readable name for the event (e.g., 'user_created', 'order_placed', 'permission_denied').

level.description: The severity level of the event.

message.description: A human-readable description of the event.

metadata.description: An object containing additional context about the event (e.g., userId, orderId, errorDetails).

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profiles. Uses path-based ownership for private data.

/services/{serviceId}.description: Stores service catalog information. Publicly readable.

/users/{userId}/orders/{orderId}.description: Stores orders placed by users. Includes denormalized 'userId' for authorization independence.

/users/{userId}/campaigns/{campaignId}.description: Stores advertising campaigns created by users. Includes denormalized 'userId' for authorization independence.

/users/{userId}/deposits/{depositId}.description: Stores deposit requests made by users. Includes denormalized 'userId' for authorization independence.

/users/{userId}/withdrawals/{withdrawalI.description: Stores withdrawal requests made by users for their affiliate earnings.

/users/{userId}/affiliateTransactions/{a.description: Stores affiliate transactions for users. Includes denormalized 'userId' for authorization independence.

/users/{userId}/tickets/{ticketId}.description: Stores support tickets created by users. Includes denormalized 'userId' for authorization independence.

/systemLogs/{logId}.description: Stores important system-wide events. Writable only by admin functions, readable only by admins.
